TopicTitle: What Does The Mun Say? (Parody of What Does The Fox Say)

Articles.Content:
Well, yeah.

Tonight, I downloaded the instrumental to What Does The Fox Say, made some lyrics, and made the song.

Official YT Video:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HK8WXb8yIc0

Might not be the best voice acting, but hey, it's my first song.

Lyrics:

Rocket goes boom

Plane goes swish

Jeb goes yay

and Bill says Who?!

Sun goes sizzle

Laythe goes wave

and Duna says Chisel

Wind goes howl

and sea goes ssssss

and the Astronaut Plex says Hi!

But theres one sound

That no one knows

What does the Mun say?

Or-or-or-or-or-orbit

Or-or-or-or-or-orbit

Or-or-or-or-or-orbit

What the Mun say?

Go-go-go-go-go-go-o-there

Go-go-go-go-go-go-o-there

Go-go-go-go-go-go-o-there

What the Mun say?

Boom boom boom boom boom boom boom

Boom boom boom boom boom boom boom

Boom boom boom boom boom boom boom

What the Mun say?

Yay yay yay yay yay yay yay yay yay

Yay yay yay yay yay yay yay yay yay

Yay yay yay yay yay yay yay yay yay

What the Mun say?

Big white disk

Pointy hill

Chasing us

and craters filled

Tiny rocks

Down the hill

But youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re crashing still

Your dust is white

So beautiful

Like the white Sun in disguise

But if you meet

a friendly plant

Will you communicate by

cha-a-a-a-nt?

cha-a-a-a-nt?

cha-a-a-a-nt?

How will you speak to that

pla-a-a-a-nt?

pla-a-a-a-nt?

pla-a-a-a-nt?

What does the Mun say?

Rock rock rock rock rock rock!

Rock rock rock rock rock rock!

Rock rock rock rock rock rock!

What the Mun say?

Kraka-kraka-kraka-krow

Kraka-kraka-kraka-krow

Kraka-kraka-kraka-krow

What the Mun say?

A-lol-lol ha-lol!

A-lol-lol ha-lol!

A-lol-lol ha-lol!

What the Mun say?

Booo-oo-ooo-ooom!

Booooom!

What does the Mun say?

The secret of the Mun

Ancient mystery

Somewhere deep into space

I know youre hiding

What is your day?

Will we ever know?

Will always be a mystery

What is your day?

Youre my brightly white disk

Hiding in deep space

What is your day?

Will we ever know?

I want to

I want to

I want to know!

Darn you. Darn you to heck for sticking that tune in my head!

On the other hand, have some well earned rep - great parody lyrics.

My first thoughts upon seeing the title of this:

"Perhaps the Moon knows the secret of the New Sound...*"

*(Click for your daily dose of strangeness. It's music sampled from The Mighty Boosh, which is a bizarre, absolutely wonderful and occasionally inappropriate comedy, which is why I've linked it and not embedded it.)

That being said:

The song lyrics are great (I'm especially pleased that they don't include mud), though I wish I could hear the lyrics at all times during the video. I do really like the concept of a "What does the Fox Say?!" parody in KSP, though. Thanks for making this.
